mapper.select: SELECT e.fran_local_num, f.fran_code, e.fran_name, h.sup_goods_laca, h.sup_goods_smca, f.hq_goods_code , h.sup_goods_name , i.sup_name , f.fran_goods_stock , f.fran_safe_stock , f.fran_suit_stock , g.goods_delivery_price , g.goods_retail_price , g.goods_max_order FROM fran_goods_detail f, fran e, hq_goods g, sup_goods h, sup i WHERE e.fran_code = f.fran_code AND g.hq_goods_code = f.hq_goods_code AND h.sup_goods_code = g.sup_goods_code AND i.sup_code = h.sup_code ORDER by f.fran_code, h.sup_goods_laca, h.sup_goods_smca, f.hq_goods_code

SELECT e.fran_local_num, f.fran_code, e.fran_name, h.sup_goods_laca, h.sup_goods_smca, f.hq_goods_code , h.sup_goods_name , i.sup_name , f.fran_goods_stock , f.fran_safe_stock , f.fran_suit_stock , g.goods_delivery_price , g.goods_retail_price , g.goods_max_order FROM fran_goods_detail f, fran e, hq_goods g, sup_goods h, sup i WHERE e.fran_code is not null AND g.hq_goods_code = f.hq_goods_code AND h.sup_goods_code = g.sup_goods_code AND i.sup_code = h.sup_code AND e.fran_code = f.fran_code
ORDER by f.fran_code, h.sup_goods_laca, h.sup_goods_smca, f.hq_goods_code

SELECT count(*) FROM fran_goods_detail f, fran e, hq_goods g, sup_goods h, sup i WHERE h.sup_goods_code is not null AND e.fran_code = f.fran_code AND g.hq_goods_code = f.hq_goods_code AND h.sup_goods_code = g.sup_goods_code AND i.sup_code = h.sup_code

SELECT c.logis_code, c.logis_local_num, c.logis_name, d.wh_name, f.sup_goods_laca, f.sup_goods_smca, f.sup_goods_name, d.hq_goods_code, d.logis_goods_stock, d.logis_safe_stock, d.logis_suit_stock, e.goods_max_order, e.goods_delivery_price FROM logis_wh d, logis c, hq_goods e, sup_goods f WHERE c.logis_code is not null AND c.logis_code = d.logis_code AND e.hq_goods_code = d.hq_goods_code AND f.sup_goods_code = e.sup_goods_code ORDER by c.logis_code, d.wh_name, f.sup_goods_laca, f.sup_goods_smca, d.hq_goods_code

SELECT c.logis_code, c.logis_local_num, c.logis_name, d.wh_name, f.sup_goods_laca, f.sup_goods_smca, f.sup_goods_name, d.hq_goods_code, d.logis_goods_stock, d.logis_safe_stock, d.logis_suit_stock, e.goods_max_order, e.goods_delivery_price FROM logis_wh d, logis c, hq_goods e, sup_goods f WHERE c.logis_code is not null AND c.logis_code = d.logis_code AND e.hq_goods_code = d.hq_goods_code AND f.sup_goods_code = e.sup_goods_code
ORDER by c.logis_code, d.wh_name, f.sup_goods_laca, f.sup_goods_smca, d.hq_goods_code

SELECT count(*) FROM logis_wh d, logis c, hq_goods e, sup_goods f WHERE c.logis_code is not null AND c.logis_code = d.logis_code AND e.hq_goods_code = d.hq_goods_code AND f.sup_goods_code = e.sup_goods_code

SELECT distinct d.taking_code, d.logis_code, a.logis_name, d.wh_code, b.wh_name, TO_CHAR(d.taking_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') TDATE
FROM logis_wh b, logis a, hq_goods c, logis_stock_taking d WHERE a.logis_code = b.logis_code AND b.hq_goods_code = c.hq_goods_code AND d.logis_code = a.logis_code AND d.wh_code = b.wh_code AND d.hq_goods_code = c.hq_goods_code ORDER BY d.taking_code, d.wh_code

SELECT distinct d.taking_code, d.logis_code, a.logis_name, d.wh_code, b.wh_name, TO_CHAR(d.taking_date, 'YYYY-MM-DD') TDATE FROM logis_wh b, logis a, hq_goods c, logis_stock_taking d WHERE a.logis_code = b.logis_code AND b.hq_goods_code = c.hq_goods_code AND d.logis_code = a.logis_code AND d.wh_code = b.wh_code AND d.hq_goods_code = c.hq_goods_code
ORDER BY d.taking_code
SELECT count(distinct d.taking_code) FROM logis_stock_taking d WHERE taking_code is not null

SELECT d.taking_code, d.logis_code, a.logis_name, d.wh_code, b.wh_name, d.taking_date, c.hq_goods_code, c.hq_goods_name, b.logis_goods_stock, d.computer_stock, d.actual_stock, d.deff_quantity, d.adjust_quantity, d.note FROM logis_wh b, logis a, hq_goods c, logis_stock_taking d WHERE d.taking_code is not null AND a.logis_code = b.logis_code AND b.hq_goods_code = c.hq_goods_code AND d.logis_code = a.logis_code AND d.wh_code = b.wh_code AND d.hq_goods_code = c.hq_goods_code AND d.taking_code = #{data}

SELECT e.logis_safe_stock, e.logis_suit_stock, e.logis_goods_stock, e.wh_name, f.sup_goods_name, f.sup_goods_smca, f.sup_goods_laca, d.goods_max_order, d.hq_goods_code, E.LOGIS_CODE FROM logis_wh e, hq_goods d, sup_goods f WHERE d.hq_goods_code = e.hq_goods_code AND f.sup_goods_code = d.sup_goods_code

SELECT e.logis_safe_stock, e.logis_suit_stock, e.logis_goods_stock, e.wh_name, f.sup_goods_name, f.sup_goods_smca, f.sup_goods_laca, d.goods_max_order, d.hq_goods_code, E.LOGIS_CODE FROM logis_wh e, hq_goods d, sup_goods f WHERE d.hq_goods_code = e.hq_goods_code AND f.sup_goods_code = d.sup_goods_code
